member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO
member.summary: ThePOLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO structure provides information about a policy-setting event.

member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO.szKey
member.summary: This member is optional. If it is NULL, the system generates a value.

member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO.szEventSource
member.summary: Pointer to a string specifying the name of the source (application, service, driver, subsystem) that generated the log entry.

member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO.szEventLogName
member.summary: Pointer to a string specifying the name of the event log.

member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO.dwEventID
member.summary: Specifies the event log message ID.

member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO.dwErrorCode
member.summary: Asystem error code that indicates an error that occurred during the application of the policy setting.

summary.para: Specifies the status of the policy setting. This member can be one of the following values.
The client-side extension does not define a status for this policy setting.
The policy setting was applied successfully.
The policy setting was ignored; the system made no attempt to apply it.
Application of the policy setting failed. Details about the failure are indicated by the other members of the structure.
The policy setting was applied successfully, but an error occurred while attempting to apply the child setting.

member.name: POLICYSETTINGSTATUSINFO.timeLogged
member.summary: Specifies a structure that indicates the time at which the source generated the event.
